   20: 
   21: -module(trace_session_SUITE).
   22: 
   23: -export([all/0, suite/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1]).
   24: 
   25: -export([test_set_on_spawn/1,
   26:          test_set_on_first_spawn/1,
   27:          test_set_on_link/1,
   28:          test_set_on_first_link/1,
   29:          on_load/1,
   30:          trace_info_on_load/1,
   31:          procs/1,
   32:          basic/1,
   33:          call/1,
   34:          meta/1,
   35:          return_to/1,
   36:          destroy/1,
   37:          negative/1,
   38:          error_info/1,
   39:          end_of_list/1]).
   40: 
   41: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   42: 
   43: 
   44: -undef(line).
   45: -ifdef(debug).
   46: -define(line,io:format("line ~p\n",[?LINE]),erlang:display(?LINE)).
   47: -else.
   48: -define(line,void).
   49: -endif.
   50: 
   51: -export([foo/0, exported/1, middle/1, bottom/1]).
   52: 
   53: suite() ->
   54:     [{ct_hooks,[ts_install_cth]},
   55:      {timetrap, {minutes, 1}}].
   56: 
   57: all() ->
   58:     [
   59:      basic,
   60:      call,
   61:      meta,
   62:      on_load,
   63:      trace_info_on_load,
   64:      procs,
   65:      test_set_on_spawn,
   66:      test_set_on_first_spawn,
   67:      test_set_on_link,
   68:      test_set_on_first_link,
   69:      return_to,
   70:      destroy,
   71:      negative,
   72:      error_info,
   73:      end_of_list].
   74: 
   75: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   76:     Was = erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, true),
   77:     [{available_internal_state, Was} | Config].
   78: 
   79: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   80:     case proplists:get_value(available_internal_state, Config) of
   81:         false ->
   82:             erts_debug:set_internal_state(available_internal_state, false);
   83:         true ->
   84:             ignore
   85:     end.
   86: 
   87: erlang_trace(legacy, Pid, How, FlagList) ->
   88:     erlang:trace(Pid, How, FlagList);
   89: erlang_trace(Session, Pid, How, FlagList) when is_pid(Pid) ->
   90:     trace:process(Session, Pid, How, FlagList).
   91: 
   92: erlang_trace_pattern(legacy, MFA, MS, FlagList) ->
   93:     erlang:trace_pattern(MFA, MS, FlagList);
   94: erlang_trace_pattern(Session, MFA, MS, FlagList) ->
   95:     trace:function(Session, MFA, MS, FlagList).
   96: 
   97: 
   98: on_load(_Config) ->
   99:     Tester= self(),
  100:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  101:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  102:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  103:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  104:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  105:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  106: 
  107:     catch erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  108:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  109:     catch erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  110: 
  111:     on_load1(S1, Tracer1),
  112:     on_load2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  113:              S2, Tracer2, []),
  114:     on_load2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  115:              S2, Tracer2, []),
  116:     on_load2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  117:              legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  118: 
  119:     on_load2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  120:              S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  121:     on_load2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  122:              S1, Tracer1, []),
  123: 
  124:     ok.
  125: 
  126: trace_info_on_load(_Config) ->
  127:     Tester = self(),
  128:     Tracer = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer", Tester) end),
  129:     S = trace:session_create(?MODULE, Tracer, []),
  130:     1 = trace:process(S, self(), true, [call]),
  131:     0 = trace:function(S, on_load, true, []),
  132:     {all,[{traced,global},
  133:       {match_spec,[]},
  134:       {meta,false},
  135:       {meta_match_spec,false},
  136:       {call_count,false}]} = trace:info(S, on_load, all),
  137:     ok.
  138: 
  139: on_load1(Session, Tracer) ->
  140:     Tracee = self(),
  141:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [call]),
  142:     0 = trace:function(Session, on_load, true, []),
  143:     dummy:module_info(),
  144:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  145:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  146:     ?line,
  147:     {Tracer, {trace,Tracee,call,{dummy,module_info,[]}}} = receive_any(),
  148:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [call]),
  149:     dummy:module_info(),
  150:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  151:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  152:     ?line,
  153:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  154:     0 = trace:function(Session, on_load, false, []),
  155:     ok.
  156: on_load2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  157:     Tracee = self(),
  158:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [call|Opts1]),
  159:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [call|Opts2]),
  160:     Opts1_1 = proplists:delete(tracer, Opts1),
  161:     Opts2_1 = proplists:delete(tracer, Opts2),
  162:     0 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, on_load, true, Opts1_1),
  163:     0 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, on_load, true, Opts2_1),
  164:     dummy:module_info(),
  165:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  166:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  167:     ?line,
  168:     receive_unsorted(
  169:         [{Tracer1,{trace,Tracee,call,{dummy,module_info,[]}}},
  170:          {Tracer2,{trace,Tracee,call,{dummy,module_info,[]}}}]),
  171:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [call|Opts1]),
  172:     dummy:module_info(),
  173:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  174:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  175:     ?line,
  176:     {Tracer2, {trace,Tracee,call,{dummy,module_info,[]}}} = receive_any(),
  177:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [call|Opts2]),
  178:     dummy:module_info(),
  179:     erlang:delete_module(dummy),
  180:     erlang:purge_module(dummy),
  181:     ?line,
  182:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  183: 
  184:     0 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, on_load, false, Opts1_1),
  185:     0 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, on_load, false, Opts2_1),
  186:     ok.
  187: 
  188: test_set_on_spawn(_Config) ->
  189:     Tester= self(),
  190:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  191:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  192:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  193:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  194:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  195:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  196: 
  197:     set_on_spawn(S1, Tracer1),
  198:     set_on_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  199:                   S2, Tracer2, []),
  200:     set_on_spawn2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  201:                   S2, Tracer2, []),
  202:     set_on_spawn2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  203:                   legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  204: 
  205:     set_on_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  206:                   S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  207:     set_on_spawn2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  208:                   S1, Tracer1, []),
  209: 
  210:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  211:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  212:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  213: 
  214:     unlink(Tracer0),
  215:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  216:     unlink(Tracer1),
  217:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  218:     unlink(Tracer2),
  219:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  220:     ok.
  221: test_set_on_first_spawn(_Config) ->
  222:     Tester= self(),
  223:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  224:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  225:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  226:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  227:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  228:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  229: 
  230:     set_on_first_spawn(S1, Tracer1),
  231:     set_on_first_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  232:                         S2, Tracer2, []),
  233:     set_on_first_spawn2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  234:                         S2, Tracer2, []),
  235:     set_on_first_spawn2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  236:                         legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  237: 
  238:     set_on_first_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  239:                         S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  240:     set_on_first_spawn2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  241:                         S1, Tracer1, []),
  242: 
  243:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  244:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  245:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  246: 
  247:     unlink(Tracer0),
  248:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  249:     unlink(Tracer1),
  250:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  251:     unlink(Tracer2),
  252:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  253:     ok.
  254: test_set_on_link(_Config) ->
  255:     Tester= self(),
  256:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  257:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  258:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  259:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  260:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  261:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  262: 
  263:     set_on_link(S1, Tracer1),
  264:     set_on_link2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  265:                  S2, Tracer2, []),
  266:     set_on_link2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  267:                  S2, Tracer2, []),
  268:     set_on_link2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  269:                  legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  270: 
  271:     set_on_link2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  272:                  S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  273:     set_on_link2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  274:                  S1, Tracer1, []),
  275:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  276:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  277:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  278: 
  279:     unlink(Tracer0),
  280:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  281:     unlink(Tracer1),
  282:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  283:     unlink(Tracer2),
  284:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  285:     ok.
  286: 
  287: test_set_on_first_link(_Config) ->
  288:     Tester= self(),
  289:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  290:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  291:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  292:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  293:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  294:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  295: 
  296:     set_on_first_link(S1, Tracer1),
  297:     set_on_first_link2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  298:                        S2, Tracer2, []),
  299:     set_on_first_link2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  300:                        S2, Tracer2, []),
  301:     set_on_first_link2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  302:                        legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  303: 
  304:     set_on_first_link2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  305:                        S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  306:     set_on_first_link2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  307:                        S1, Tracer1, []),
  308:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  309:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  310:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  311: 
  312:     unlink(Tracer0),
  313:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  314:     unlink(Tracer1),
  315:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  316:     unlink(Tracer2),
  317:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  318:     ok.
  319: set_on_spawn(Session, Tracer) ->
  320:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn]),
  321:     Tracee = self(),
  322:     Child = spawn(fun F() ->
  323:                           receive hej ->
  324:                                   Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  325:                                   exit(Pid, die),
  326:                                   Tracee ! {done, Pid},
  327:                                   F()
  328:                           end
  329:                   end),
  330:     Child ! hej,
  331:     receive {done, GrandChild} -> ok end,
  332:     exit(Child, die),
  333:     receive_parallel(
  334:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn, Child,'_'}}],
  335: 
  336:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child, spawned, Tracee,'_'}},
  337:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, spawn, GrandChild, '_'}},
  338:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  339: 
  340:        [{Tracer,{trace, GrandChild, spawned, Child,'_'}},
  341:         {Tracer,{trace, GrandChild, exit, die}}]
  342:       }),
  343:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn]),
  344:     ok.
  345: 
  346: set_on_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  347:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts1]),
  348:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts2]),
  349:     Tracee = self(),
  350:     Child = spawn(fun F() ->
  351:                           receive hej ->
  352:                                   Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  353:                                   exit(Pid, die),
  354:                                   Tracee ! {done, Pid},
  355:                                   F()
  356:                           end
  357:                   end),
  358:     Child ! hej,
  359:     receive {done, GrandChild} -> ok end,
  360:     exit(Child, die),
  361:     receive_parallel(
  362:       {[{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child,'_'}}],
  363: 
  364:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child,'_'}}],
  365: 
  366:        [{Tracer1, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  367:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, spawn, GrandChild, '_'}},
  368:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  369: 
  370:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee,'_'}},
  371:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, spawn, GrandChild, '_'}},
  372:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  373: 
  374:        [{Tracer1, {trace, GrandChild, spawned, Child, '_'}},
  375:         {Tracer1, {trace, GrandChild, exit, die}}],
  376: 
  377:        [{Tracer2, {trace, GrandChild, spawned, Child, '_'}},
  378:         {Tracer2,{trace, '_', exit, die}}]
  379:       }),
  380: 
  381:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts1]),
  382: 
  383:     Child1 = spawn(fun F() ->
  384:                            receive hej ->
  385:                                    Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  386:                                    exit(Pid, die),
  387:                                    Tracee ! {done, Pid},
  388:                                    F()
  389:                            end
  390:                    end),
  391:     Child1 ! hej,
  392:     receive {done, GrandChild1} -> ok end,
  393:     exit(Child1, die),
  394:     receive_parallel(
  395:       {[{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child1,'_'}}],
  396: 
  397:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Child1, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  398:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, spawn, GrandChild1, '_'}},
  399:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, exit, die}}],
  400: 
  401:        [{Tracer2,{trace, GrandChild1, spawned, Child1,'_'}},
  402:         {Tracer2,{trace, GrandChild1, exit, die}}]
  403:       }),
  404: 
  405:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts2]),
  406:     ok.
  407: 
  408: set_on_first_spawn(Session, Tracer) ->
  409:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_spawn]),
  410:     Tracee = self(),
  411:     TraceeChild = spawn(fun F() ->
  412:                                 receive hej ->
  413:                                         Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  414:                                         Tracee ! spawned,
  415:                                         exit(Pid, die),
  416:                                         F()
  417:                                 end
  418:                         end),
  419:     TraceeChild ! hej,
  420:     receive spawned -> ok end,
  421:     exit(TraceeChild, die),
  422:     TraceeChild1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  423:     exit(TraceeChild1, die),
  424:     receive_parallel(
  425:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  426:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild1,'_'}}],
  427: 
  428:        [{Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  429:         {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, spawn,'_','_'}},
  430:         {Tracer,{trace, TraceeChild, exit, die}}]}),
  431: 
  432:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_spawn]),
  433:     ok.
  434: set_on_first_spawn2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  435:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts1]),
  436:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts2]),
  437:     Tracee = self(),
  438:     TraceeChild = spawn(fun F() ->
  439:                                 receive hej ->
  440:                                         Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  441:                                         exit(Pid, die),
  442:                                         Tracee ! done,
  443:                                         F()
  444:                                 end
  445:                         end),
  446:     TraceeChild ! hej,
  447:     receive done -> ok end,
  448:     exit(TraceeChild, die),
  449:     TraceeChild1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  450:     exit(TraceeChild1, die),
  451:     receive_parallel(
  452:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  453:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild1,'_'}}],
  454: 
  455:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild,'_'}},
  456:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild1,'_'}}],
  457: 
  458:        [{Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  459:         {Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, spawn,'_','_'}},
  460:         {Tracer1,{trace, TraceeChild, exit, die}}],
  461: 
  462:        [{Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  463:         {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, spawn,'_','_'}},
  464:         {Tracer2,{trace, TraceeChild, exit, die}}]
  465:       }),
  466: 
  467:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts1]),
  468:     TraceeChild2 = spawn(fun F() ->
  469:                                  receive hej ->
  470:                                          Pid = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  471:                                          exit(Pid, die),
  472:                                          F()
  473:                                  end
  474:                          end),
  475:     TraceeChild2 ! hej,
  476:     exit(TraceeChild2, die),
  477:     TraceeChild21 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  478:     exit(TraceeChild21, die),
  479: 
  480:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild2,_}} = receive_any(),
  481:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,TraceeChild21,_}} = receive_any(),
  482:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_spawn | Opts2]),
  483:     ok.
  484: 
  485: set_on_link(Session, Tracer) ->
  486:     %% Test set_on_link via spawn_link/1
  487:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link]),
  488:     Tracee = self(),
  489:     Child = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  490:     unlink(Child),
  491:     exit(Child, die),
  492:     receive_parallel(
  493:       {[{Tracer, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child,'_'}},
  494:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  495:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  496: 
  497:        [{Tracer, {trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  498:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  499:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  500:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, exit, die}}]
  501:       }),
  502: 
  503:     %% Test set_on_link via link/1
  504:     Child2 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  505:     link(Child2),
  506:     unlink(Child2),
  507:     exit(Child2, die),
  508:     receive_parallel(
  509:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child2,'_'}},
  510:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child2}},
  511:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child2}}],
  512: 
  513:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child2, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  514:         {Tracer,{trace, Child2, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  515:         {Tracer,{trace, Child2, exit, die}}]
  516:        }),
  517: 
  518:     %% Test that you can disable the tracer but still get traces
  519:     %% from child process
  520:     Child3 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  521:     link(Child3),
  522:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link]),
  523:     unlink(Child3),
  524:     exit(Child3, die),
  525:     receive_parallel(
  526:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn, Child3,'_'}},
  527:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child3}}],
  528: 
  529:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child3, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  530:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  531:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, exit, die}}]
  532:       }),
  533: 
  534:     %% Test that you can disable the tracer for the child process
  535:     %% and get messages from the parent
  536:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link]),
  537:     Child4 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  538:     link(Child4),
  539:     receive_parallel(
  540:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child4,'_'}},
  541:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child4}}],
  542: 
  543:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child4, getting_linked, Tracee}}]
  544:       }),
  545:     1 = trace:process(Session, Child4, false, [procs, set_on_link]),
  546:     unlink(Child4),
  547:     exit(Child4, die),
  548:     {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child4}} = receive_any(),
  549: 
  550:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link]),
  551:     spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  552:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  553:     ok.
  554: set_on_link2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  555:     %% Test multiple tracers with set_on_link via spawn_link/1
  556:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  557:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link | Opts2]),
  558:     Tracee = self(),
  559:     Child = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  560:     unlink(Child),
  561:     exit(Child, die),
  562: 
  563:     receive_parallel(
  564:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  565:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  566:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  567: 
  568:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  569:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  570:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  571: 
  572:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  573:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  574:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  575:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  576: 
  577:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  578:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  579:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  580:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, exit, die}}]
  581:       }),
  582: 
  583:     %% Test multiple tracers with set_on_link via link/1
  584:     Child1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  585:     ?line,
  586:     link(Child1),
  587:     unlink(Child1),
  588:     exit(Child1, die),
  589: 
  590:     receive_parallel(
  591:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  592:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}},
  593:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  594: 
  595:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  596:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}},
  597:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  598: 
  599:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child1, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  600:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child1, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  601:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child1, exit, die}}],
  602: 
  603:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child1, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  604:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child1, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  605:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child1, exit, die}}]
  606:       }),
  607: 
  608:     %% Disable one tracer and test that set_on_link still works for the other tracer
  609:     %% via spawn_link/1
  610:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  611:     Child2 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  612:     unlink(Child2),
  613:     exit(Child2, die),
  614:     receive_parallel(
  615:       {[{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child2,'_'}},
  616:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child2}},
  617:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child2}}],
  618: 
  619:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child2, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  620:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child2, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  621:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child2, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  622:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child2, exit, die}}]
  623:       }),
  624:     %% Test with link/1
  625:     Child21 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  626:     link(Child21),
  627:     unlink(Child21),
  628:     exit(Child21, die),
  629:     receive_parallel(
  630:       {[{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child21,'_'}},
  631:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child21}},
  632:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child21}}],
  633: 
  634:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child21, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  635:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child21, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  636:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child21, exit, die}}]
  637:       }),
  638:     %% Test that you can disable one of the tracers on the child process
  639:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  640:     Child11 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  641:     link(Child11),
  642:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, Child11, false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  643:     receive_parallel(
  644:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child11,'_'}},
  645:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child11}}],
  646: 
  647:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child11,'_'}},
  648:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child11}}],
  649: 
  650:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child11, getting_linked, Tracee}}],
  651: 
  652:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child11, getting_linked, Tracee}}]
  653:       }),
  654:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, Child11, false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  655:     unlink(Child11),
  656:     exit(Child11, die),
  657:     receive_parallel(
  658:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child11}}],
  659: 
  660:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child11}}],
  661: 
  662:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child11, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  663:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child11, exit, die}}]
  664:       }),
  665: 
  666:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts1]),
  667:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_link | Opts2]),
  668:     ok.
  669: 
  670: set_on_first_link(Session, Tracer) ->
  671:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_link]),
  672:     Tracee = self(),
  673:     Child = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  674:     Child1 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  675:     unlink(Child),
  676:     exit(Child, die),
  677:     unlink(Child1),
  678:     exit(Child1, die),
  679:     receive_parallel(
  680:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  681:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  682:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  683:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}},
  684:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}},
  685:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  686: 
  687:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  688:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  689:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  690:         {Tracer,{trace, Child, exit, die}}]
  691:       }),
  692:     %% Test that spawn on first link works with link/1
  693:     1 = trace:process(Session, Tracee, true, [set_on_first_link]),
  694:     Child2 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  695:     Child21 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  696:     link(Child2),
  697:     link(Child21),
  698:     unlink(Child2),
  699:     unlink(Child21),
  700:     exit(Child2, die),
  701:     exit(Child21,die),
  702:     receive_parallel(
  703:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child2,'_'}},
  704:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child21,'_'}},
  705:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child2}},
  706:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child21}},
  707:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child2}},
  708:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child21}}],
  709: 
  710:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child2, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  711:         {Tracer,{trace, Child2, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  712:         {Tracer,{trace, Child2, exit, die}}]
  713:       }),
  714:     %% Test that spawn on first link flag is not on the child
  715:     1 = trace:process(Session, Tracee, true, [set_on_first_link]),
  716:     Child3 = spawn(fun F() -> receive hej ->
  717:                                       spawn_link(fun()-> receive M -> M end end),
  718:                                       Tracee ! done,
  719:                                       F()
  720:                               end
  721:                    end),
  722:     link(Child3),
  723:     Child3 ! hej,
  724:     receive done -> ok end,
  725:     unlink(Child3),
  726:     exit(Child3, die),
  727:     receive_parallel(
  728:       {[{Tracer,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child3,'_'}},
  729:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, link, Child3}},
  730:         {Tracer,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child3}}],
  731: 
  732:        [{Tracer,{trace, Child3, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  733:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, spawn,'_','_'}},
  734:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, link, '_'}},
  735:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  736:         {Tracer,{trace, Child3, exit, die}}]
  737:       }),
  738:     1 = trace:process(Session, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_link]),
  739:     ok.
  740: 
  741: set_on_first_link2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  742:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts1]),
  743:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts2]),
  744:     Tracee = self(),
  745:     Child = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  746:     Child1 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  747:     receive_parallel(
  748:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  749:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  750:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  751:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}}],
  752: 
  753:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child,'_'}},
  754:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  755:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child1,'_'}},
  756:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child1}}],
  757: 
  758:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  759:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}}],
  760: 
  761:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child, spawned,Tracee,'_'}},
  762:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}}]
  763:        }),
  764: 
  765:     unlink(Child),
  766:     exit(Child, die),
  767:     unlink(Child1),
  768:     exit(Child1, die),
  769:     receive_parallel(
  770:       {[{Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}},
  771:         {Tracer1,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  772: 
  773:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}},
  774:         {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  775: 
  776:        [{Tracer1,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  777:         {Tracer1,{trace, Child, exit, die}}],
  778: 
  779:        [{Tracer2,{trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  780:         {Tracer2,{trace, Child, exit, die}}]
  781:       }),
  782: 
  783:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts1]),
  784:     Child2 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  785:     Child21 = spawn_link(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  786:     unlink(Child2),
  787:     exit(Child2, die),
  788:     unlink(Child21),
  789:     exit(Child21, die),
  790:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child2,_}} = receive_any(),
  791:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child2}} = receive_any(),
  792:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, spawn,Child21,_}} = receive_any(),
  793:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, link, Child21}} = receive_any(),
  794:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child2}} = receive_any(),
  795:     {Tracer2,{trace, Tracee, unlink, Child21}} = receive_any(),
  796:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_first_link | Opts2]),
  797:     ok.
  798: procs(_Config) ->
  799:     Tester= self(),
  800:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0", Tester) end),
  801:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1", Tester) end),
  802:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2", Tester) end),
  803: 
  804:     procs_do1(Tracer0, [{tracer, Tracer0}]),
  805: 
  806:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  807:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  808:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  809: 
  810:     procs_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  811:               S2, Tracer2, []),
  812:     procs_do2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  813:               S2, Tracer2, []),
  814:     procs_do2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  815:               legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  816: 
  817:     procs_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  818:               S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  819:     procs_do2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  820:               S1, Tracer1, []),
  821: 
  822:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  823:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  824:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  825: 
  826:     unlink(Tracer0),
  827:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  828:     unlink(Tracer1),
  829:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  830:     unlink(Tracer2),
  831:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  832:     ok.
  833: 
  834: procs_do1(Tracer, Opts) ->
  835:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts]),
  836: 
  837:     Tracee = self(),
  838:     RegName = ?MODULE,
  839:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  840:     unregister(RegName),
  841:     Child = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  842:     link(Child),
  843:     unlink(Child),
  844:     exit(Child, die),
  845:     receive_parallel(
  846:       {[{Tracer, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
  847:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}},
  848:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child, '_'}},
  849:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  850:         {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  851: 
  852:        [{Tracer, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  853:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  854:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  855:         {Tracer, {trace, Child, exit, '_'}}]}),
  856:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts]),
  857: 
  858:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  859:     unregister(RegName),
  860:     Child1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  861:     link(Child1),
  862:     unlink(Child1),
  863:     exit(Child1, die),
  864: 
  865:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  866: 
  867:     ok.
  868: procs_do2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  869:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts1]),
  870:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts2]),
  871: 
  872:     Tracee = self(),
  873:     RegName = ?MODULE,
  874:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  875:     unregister(RegName),
  876:     Child = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  877:     link(Child),
  878:     unlink(Child),
  879:     exit(Child, die),
  880:     receive_parallel(
  881:       {[{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
  882:         {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}},
  883:         {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child, '_'}},
  884:         {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  885:         {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  886: 
  887:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
  888:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}},
  889:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child, '_'}},
  890:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, link, Child}},
  891:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child}}],
  892: 
  893:        [{Tracer1, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  894:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  895:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  896:         {Tracer1, {trace, Child, exit, '_'}}],
  897: 
  898:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Child, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  899:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  900:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  901:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child, exit, '_'}}]
  902:       }),
  903: 
  904:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts1]),
  905:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  906:     unregister(RegName),
  907:     Child1 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  908:     link(Child1),
  909:     unlink(Child1),
  910:     exit(Child1, die),
  911:     receive_parallel(
  912:       {[{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
  913:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}},
  914:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, spawn, Child1, '_'}},
  915:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, link, Child1}},
  916:         {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unlink, Child1}}],
  917: 
  918:        [{Tracer2, {trace, Child1, spawned, Tracee, '_'}},
  919:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, getting_linked, Tracee}},
  920:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, getting_unlinked, Tracee}},
  921:         {Tracer2, {trace, Child1, exit, '_'}}]
  922:       }),
  923: 
  924:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs, set_on_spawn | Opts2]),
  925:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  926:     unregister(RegName),
  927:     Child2 = spawn(fun() -> receive M -> M end end),
  928:     link(Child2),
  929:     unlink(Child2),
  930:     exit(Child2, die),
  931:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  932:     ok.
  933: 
  934: basic(_Config) ->
  935:     Tester = self(),
  936:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0",Tester) end),
  937:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1",Tester) end),
  938:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2",Tester) end),
  939: 
  940:     basic_do1(Tracer0, [{tracer, Tracer0}]),
  941: 
  942:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
  943:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
  944:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
  945: 
  946:     basic_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  947:               S2, Tracer2, []),
  948:     basic_do2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  949:               S2, Tracer2, []),
  950:     basic_do2(S2, Tracer2, [],
  951:               legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  952: 
  953:     basic_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
  954:               S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}]),
  955:     basic_do2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
  956:               S1, Tracer1, []),
  957: 
  958:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
  959:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
  960:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
  961: 
  962:     unlink(Tracer0),
  963:     exit(Tracer0, die),
  964:     unlink(Tracer1),
  965:     exit(Tracer1, die),
  966:     unlink(Tracer2),
  967:     exit(Tracer2, die),
  968: 
  969:     ok.
  970: 
  971: basic_do1(Tracer, Opts) ->
  972:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), true, [procs | Opts]),
  973: 
  974:     Tracee = self(),
  975:     RegName = ?MODULE,
  976:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  977:     unregister(RegName),
  978: 
  979:     {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}} = receive_any(),
  980:     {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}} = receive_any(),
  981: 
  982:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [procs | Opts]),
  983: 
  984:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  985:     unregister(RegName),
  986: 
  987:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
  988: 
  989:     ok.
  990: 
  991: basic_do2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2) ->
  992:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), true, [procs | Opts1]),
  993:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), true, [procs | Opts2]),
  994: 
  995:     Tracee = self(),
  996:     RegName = ?MODULE,
  997:     register(RegName, Tracee),
  998:     unregister(RegName),
  999: 
 1000:     receive_parallel({[{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
 1001:                        {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}}],
 1002: 
 1003:                       [{Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}},
 1004:                        {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}}]}),
 1005: 
 1006:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [procs | Opts1]),
 1007: 
 1008:     register(RegName, Tracee),
 1009:     unregister(RegName),
 1010: 
 1011:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, register, RegName}} = receive_any(),
 1012:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, unregister, RegName}} = receive_any(),
 1013: 
 1014:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [procs | Opts2]),
 1015: 
 1016:     register(RegName, Tracee),
 1017:     unregister(RegName),
 1018: 
 1019:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1020: 
 1021:     ok.
 1022: 
 1023: 
 1024: call(_Config) ->
 1025:     Tester = self(),
 1026:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0",Tester) end),
 1027:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1",Tester) end),
 1028:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2",Tester) end),
 1029: 
 1030:     call_do1(Tracer0, [{tracer, Tracer0}]),
 1031: 
 1032:     S0 = trace:session_create(session0, undefined, []),
 1033:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
 1034:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
 1035: 
 1036:     [begin
 1037:          io:format("CallType = ~p\n", [CallType]),
 1038:          call_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
 1039:                   S2, Tracer2, [], CallType),
 1040:          call_do2(legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
 1041:                   S2, Tracer2, [], CallType),
 1042:          call_do2(S2, Tracer2, [],
 1043:                   legacy, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}], CallType),
 1044: 
 1045:          call_do2(S1, Tracer1, [],
 1046:                   S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}], CallType),
 1047:          call_do2(S0, Tracer0, [{tracer,Tracer0}],
 1048:                   S1, Tracer1, [], CallType)
 1049:      end
 1050:      || CallType <- [
 1051:                      {[local], fun() -> foo() end},
 1052:                      {[global], fun() -> ?MODULE:foo() end},
 1053:                      {[local], fun() -> ?MODULE:foo() end}]
 1054:     ],
 1055: 
 1056:     true = trace:session_destroy(S0),
 1057:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
 1058:     true = trace:session_destroy(S2),
 1059: 
 1060:     unlink(Tracer0),
 1061:     exit(Tracer0, die),
 1062:     unlink(Tracer1),
 1063:     exit(Tracer1, die),
 1064:     unlink(Tracer2),
 1065:     exit(Tracer2, die),
 1066: 
 1067:     ok.
 1068: 
 1069: call_do1(Tracer, Opts) ->
 1070:     MFArity = {?MODULE,foo,0},
 1071:     MFArgs = {?MODULE,foo,[]},
 1072:     Tracee = self(),
 1073:     1 = erlang:trace(Tracee, true, [call | Opts]),
 1074:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern(MFArity, true, [local]),
 1075: 
 1076:     foo(),
 1077: 
 1078:     {Tracer, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1079: 
 1080:     1 = erlang:trace(self(), false, [call | Opts]),
 1081: 
 1082:     foo(),
 1083:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1084: 
 1085:     ok.
 1086: 
 1087: call_do2(S1, Tracer1, Opts1, S2, Tracer2, Opts2, {TPopt, Call}) ->
 1088:     MFArity = {?MODULE,foo,0},
 1089:     MFArgs = {?MODULE,foo,[]},
 1090:     Tracee = self(),
 1091:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, Tracee, true, [call | Opts1]),
 1092:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, Tracee, true, [call | Opts2]),
 1093: 
 1094:     ?line,
 1095:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, true, TPopt),
 1096:     Call(),
 1097:     {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1098:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1099: 
 1100:     ?line,
 1101:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, true, TPopt),
 1102:     Call(),
 1103:     receive_unsorted([{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}},
 1104:                       {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}}]),
 1105:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1106: 
 1107:     ?line,
 1108:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, false, TPopt),
 1109:     Call(),
 1110:     {Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1111:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1112: 
 1113:     ?line,
 1114:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, true, TPopt),
 1115:     Call(),
 1116:     receive_unsorted([{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}},
 1117:                       {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}}]),
 1118:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1119: 
 1120:     ?line,
 1121:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, false, TPopt),
 1122:     Call(),
 1123:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1124:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1125: 
 1126:     ?line,
 1127:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, true, TPopt),
 1128:     Call(),
 1129:     receive_unsorted([{Tracer1, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}},
 1130:                       {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}}]),
 1131:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1132: 
 1133:     ?line,
 1134:     1 = erlang_trace(S1, self(), false, [call | Opts1]),
 1135:     Call(),
 1136:     {Tracer2, {trace, Tracee, call, MFArgs}} = receive_any(),
 1137:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1138: 
 1139:     ?line,
 1140:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S2, MFArity, false, TPopt),
 1141:     Call(),
 1142:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1143: 
 1144:     ?line,
 1145:     1 = erlang_trace_pattern(S1, MFArity, false, TPopt),
 1146:     1 = erlang_trace(S2, self(), false, [call | Opts2]),
 1147:     Call(),
 1148:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1149: 
 1150:     ok.
 1151: 
 1152: meta(_Config) ->
 1153:     Tester = self(),
 1154:     Tracer0 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer0",Tester) end),
 1155: 
 1156:     MFArity = {?MODULE,foo,0},
 1157:     MFArgs = {?MODULE,foo,[]},
 1158:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern(MFArity,true,[{meta,Tracer0}]),
 1159: 
 1160:     ?line,
 1161:     foo(),
 1162:     {Tracer0, {trace_ts,P,call,MFArgs,{_,_,_}}} = receive_any(),
 1163: 
 1164:     ?line,
 1165:     ?MODULE:foo(),
 1166:     {Tracer0, {trace_ts,P,call,MFArgs,{_,_,_}}} = receive_any(),
 1167: 
 1168:     1 = erlang:trace_pattern(MFArity,false,[meta]),
 1169: 
 1170:     ?line,
 1171:     foo(),
 1172:     timeout = receive_nothing(),
 1173: 
 1174:     unlink(Tracer0),
 1175:     exit(Tracer0, die),
 1176: 
 1177:     ok.
 1178: 
 1179: return_to(_Config) ->
 1180:     %%put(display, true),  %% To get some usable debug printouts
 1181: 
 1182:     Tester = self(),
 1183:     Tracer1 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer1",Tester,get(display)) end),
 1184:     Tracer2 = spawn_link(fun() -> tracer("Tracer2",Tester,get(display)) end),
 1185: 
 1186:     Tracee = self(),
 1187:     S1 = trace:session_create(session1, Tracer1, []),
 1188:     S2 = trace:session_create(session2, Tracer2, []),
 1189: 
 1190:     1 = trace:process(S1, Tracee, true, [call, return_to, arity]),
 1191:     1 = trace:process(S2, Tracee, true, [call, return_to, arity]),
 1192: 
 1193:     [begin
 1194:          Traced = [{S1, Tracer1, Funcs1},
 1195:                    {S2, Tracer2, Funcs2}],
 1196: 
 1197:          %% Set up tracing for all sessions
 1198:          [begin
 1199:               trace:function(Session, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, false, [local]),
 1200:               [begin
 1201:                    io_format("trace:function(~p) for tracer ~p\n", [Func, Tracer]),
 1202:                    1 = trace:function(Session, {?MODULE,Func,'_'}, true, [local])
 1203:                end
 1204:                || Func <- TracedFuncs]
 1205:           end
 1206:           || {Session, Tracer, TracedFuncs} <- Traced],
 1207: 
 1208:          %% Execute test with both local and external calls
 1209:          [return_to_do(MiddleCall, BottomCall, Traced)
 1210:           || MiddleCall <- [local, extern],
 1211:              BottomCall <- [local, extern]]
 1212:      end
 1213:      || Funcs1 <- [[bottom], [middle], [middle,bottom]],
 1214:         Funcs2 <- [[bottom], [middle], [middle,bottom]]
 1215:     ],
 1216: 
 1217:     true = trace:session_destroy(S1),
 1218:     ok.
 1219: 
 1220: return_to_do(MiddleCall, BottomCall, Traced) ->
 1221:     Tracee = self(),
 1222:     Script = [{[{'catch',MiddleCall}, {body,BottomCall}, exception],
 1223:                #{[bottom] => [{call, bottom}, {return_to, top}],
 1224:                  [middle] => [{call, middle}, {return_to, top}],
 1225:                  [middle,bottom] => [{call, middle}, {call, bottom}, {return_to,top}]
 1226:                 }},
 1227: 
 1228:               {[{'catch',MiddleCall}, {'catch',BottomCall}, exception],
 1229:                #{[bottom] => [{call, bottom}, {return_to, middle}],
 1230:                  [middle] => [{call, middle}, {return_to, top}],
 1231:                  [middle,bottom] => [{call, middle}, {call, bottom}, {return_to,middle}, {return_to,top}]
 1232:                 }},
 1233: 
 1234:               {[{'catch',MiddleCall}, {tail,BottomCall}, exception],
 1235:                #{[bottom] => [{call, bottom}, {return_to, top}],
 1236:                  [middle] => [{call, middle}, {return_to, top}],
 1237:                  [middle,bottom] => [{call, middle}, {call, bottom}, {return_to,top}]
 1238:                 }},
 1239: 
 1240:               {[{'catch',MiddleCall},  {body,BottomCall}, return],
 1241:                #{[bottom] => [{call, bottom}, {return_to, middle}],
 1242:                  [middle] => [{call, middle}, {return_to, top}],
 1243:                  [middle,bottom] => [{call, middle}, {call, bottom}, {return_to,middle}, {return_to,top}]
 1244:                 }},
 1245: 
 1246:               {[{'catch',MiddleCall}, {'catch',BottomCall}, return],
 1247:                #{[bottom] => [{call,bottom}, {return_to,middle}],
 1248:                  [middle] => [{call, middle}, {return_to, top}],
 1249:                  [middle,bottom] => [{call, middle}, {call, bottom}, {return_to,middle}, {return_to,top}]
 1250:                 }},
 1251: 
 1252:               {[{'catch',MiddleCall}, {tail,BottomCall}, return],
 1253:                #{[bottom] => [{call,bottom}, {return_to,top}],
 1254:                  [middle] => [{call, middle}, {return_to, top}],
 1255:                  [middle,bottom] => [{call, middle}, {call, bottom}, {return_to,top}]
 1256:                 }}
 1257:              ],
 1258: 
 1259:     [begin
 1260:          %% Make the call sequence
 1261:          io_format("CallSequence = ~p\n", [CallSequence]),
 1262:          top(CallSequence),
 1263: 
 1264:          %% Construct expected trace messages
 1265:          Exp = [[{Tracer, {trace, Tracee, CallOrReturnTo, {?MODULE, Func, 1}}}
 1266:                  || {CallOrReturnTo, Func} <- maps:get(TracedFuncs, TraceMap, [])]
 1267:                 || {_Session, Tracer, TracedFuncs} <- Traced],
 1268: 
 1269: 
 1270:          io_format("Exp = ~p\n", [Exp]),
 1271:          receive_parallel_list(Exp)
 1272:      end
 1273:      || {CallSequence, TraceMap} <- Script],
 1274:     ok.
 1275: 
 1276: top([{'catch',local} | T]) ->
 1277:     display("top(catch local)"),
 1278:     [(catch middle(T)) | 1];
 1279: top([{'catch',extern} | T]) ->
 1280:     display("top(catch extern)"),
 1281:     [(catch ?MODULE:middle(T)) | 1].
 1282: 
 1283: middle([{body,local} | T]) ->
 1284:     display("middle(local)"),
 1285:     [bottom(T) | 1];
 1286: middle([{body,extern} | T]) ->
 1287:     display("middle(extern)"),
 1288:     [?MODULE:bottom(T) | 1];
 1289: middle([{'catch',local} | T]) ->
 1290:     display("middle(catch local)"),
 1291:     [(catch bottom(T)) | 1];
 1292: middle([{'catch',extern} | T]) ->
 1293:     display("middle(catch extern)"),
 1294:     [(catch ?MODULE:bottom(T)) | 1];
 1295: middle([{tail,local} | T]) ->
 1296:     display("middle(tail local)"),
 1297:     bottom(T);
 1298: middle([{tail,extern} | T]) ->
 1299:     display("middle(tail extern)"),
 1300:     ?MODULE:bottom(T).
 1301: 
 1302: bottom([return | T]) ->
 1303:     display("bottom(return)"),
 1304:     T;
 1305: bottom([exception]) ->
 1306:     display("bottom(exception)"),
 1307:     error(exception).
 1308: 
 1309: display(Term) ->
 1310:     case get(display) of
 1311:         true ->
 1312:             erlang:display(Term);
 1313:         _ ->
 1314:             true
 1315:     end.
 1316: 
 1317: io_format(Frmt, List) ->
 1318:     case get(display) of
 1319:         true ->
 1320:             io:format(Frmt, List);
 1321:         _ ->
 1322:             ok
 1323:     end.
 1324: 
 1325: destroy(_Config) ->
 1326:     Name = ?MODULE,
 1327:     {_,SName1}=S1 = trace:session_create(Name, self(), []),
 1328: 
 1329:     %% Destroy session with trace_session_destroy
 1330:     destroy_do(SName1, fun() -> trace:session_destroy(S1) end),
 1331: 
 1332:     {_,SName2}=S2 = trace:session_create(Name, self(), []),
 1333: 
 1334:     %% Destroy session with GC (magic bin destructor)
 1335:     put(session, S2),
 1336:     destroy_do(SName2, fun() -> erase(session),
 1337:                                erlang:garbage_collect(),
 1338:                                wait_bp_finish(),
 1339:                                ok
 1340:                       end),
 1341: 
 1342:     ok.
 1343: 
 1344: destroy_do(SName, Destroyer) ->
 1345:     Exp = {?MODULE, exported, 1},
 1346:     Loc = {?MODULE, local, 1},
 1347:     CallMS = [{[arg],[],[]}],
 1348:     SendMS = [{[self(), message],[],[]}],
 1349:     RecvMS = [{[node(), self(), message],[],[]}],
 1350:     [Port|_] = erlang:ports(),
 1351: 
 1352:     1 = trace:function(SName, Exp, CallMS, [global]),
 1353:     1 = trace:function(SName, Loc, CallMS, [local]),
 1354:     0 = trace:function(SName, on_load, CallMS, [local]),
 1355:     1 = trace:send(SName, SendMS, []),
 1356:     1 = trace:recv(SName, RecvMS, []),
 1357:     0 = trace:process(SName, new_processes, true, [all]),
 1358:     0 = trace:port(SName, new_ports, true, [all]),
 1359:     1 = trace:process(SName, self(), true, [procs]),
 1360:     1 = trace:port(SName, Port, true, [ports]),
 1361: 
 1362:     [SName] = trace:session_info(Exp),
 1363:     [SName] = trace:session_info(Loc),
 1364:     [SName] = trace:session_info(on_load),
 1365:     SendSessions1 = trace:session_info(send),
 1366:     true = lists:member(SName, SendSessions1),
 1367:     RecvSessions1 = trace:session_info('receive'),
 1368:     true = lists:member(SName, RecvSessions1),
 1369:     [SName] = trace:session_info(new_processes),
 1370:     [SName] = trace:session_info(new_ports),
 1371:     [SName] = trace:session_info(self()),
 1372:     [SName] = trace:session_info(Port),
 1373: 
 1374:     {traced, global} = trace:info(SName, Exp, traced),
 1375:     {traced, local} = trace:info(SName, Loc, traced),
 1376:     {traced, local} = trace:info(SName, on_load, traced),
 1377:     {match_spec, SendMS} = trace:info(SName, send, match_spec),
 1378:     {match_spec, RecvMS} = trace:info(SName, 'receive', match_spec),
 1379:     {flags, [_|_]} = trace:info(SName, new_processes, flags),
 1380:     {flags, [_|_]} = trace:info(SName, new_ports, flags),
 1381:     {flags, [procs]} = trace:info(SName, self(), flags),
 1382:     {flags, [ports]} = trace:info(SName, Port, flags),
 1383: 
 1384:     Destroyer(),
 1385: 
 1386:     [] = trace:session_info(Exp),
 1387:     [] = trace:session_info(Loc),
 1388:     [] = trace:session_info(on_load),
 1389:     SendSessions2 = trace:session_info(send),
 1390:     false = lists:member(SName, SendSessions2),
 1391:     RecvSessions2 = trace:session_info('receive'),
 1392:     false = lists:member(SName, RecvSessions2),
 1393:     [] = trace:session_info(new_processes),
 1394:     [] = trace:session_info(new_ports),
 1395:     [] = trace:session_info(self()),
 1396:     [] = trace:session_info(Port),
 1397: 
 1398:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, Exp, traced)),
 1399:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, Loc, traced)),
 1400:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, on_load, traced)),
 1401:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, send, match_spec)),
 1402:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, 'receive', match_spec)),
 1403:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, new_processes, flags)),
 1404:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, new_ports, flags)),
 1405:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, self(), flags)),
 1406:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:info(SName, Port, flags)),
 1407:     true.
 1408: 
 1409: negative(_Config) ->
 1410:     Tracee = spawn_link(fun() -> receive done -> ok end end),
 1411:     SessionTracer = spawn_link(fun() -> receive done -> ok end end),
 1412:     OtherTracer = spawn_link(fun() -> receive done -> ok end end),
 1413:     MFA = {?MODULE, foo, 0},
 1414:     S = trace:session_create(?MODULE, SessionTracer, []),
 1415: 
 1416:     %% Specified tracer not allowed
 1417:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:process(S, Tracee, true, [call, {tracer,OtherTracer}])),
 1418:     1 = catch trace:process(S, Tracee, true, [call]),
 1419:     1 = catch trace:process(S, Tracee, false, [call]),
 1420: 
 1421:     %% Specified meta tracer not allowed
 1422:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:function(S, MFA, true, [{meta,OtherTracer}])),
 1423:     {'EXIT',{badarg,_}} = (catch trace:function(S, MFA, true, [{meta,erl_tracer,OtherTracer}])),
 1424:     1 = trace:function(S, MFA, true, [meta]),
 1425:     1 = trace:function(S, MFA, false, [meta]),
 1426: 
 1427:     FuncInfoItems = [all, traced, match_spec, meta, meta_match_spec,
 1428:                      call_count, call_time, call_memory],
 1429:     [{Item,undefined} = trace:info(S, {?MODULE, false, 77}, Item)
 1430:      || Item <- FuncInfoItems],
 1431:     [{Item,false} = trace:info(S, MFA, Item)
 1432:      || Item <- FuncInfoItems],
 1433: 
 1434:     trace:session_destroy(S),
 1435:     ok.
 1436: 
 1437: %% Test error reporting of module 'trace'.
 1438: error_info(_Config) ->
 1439:     %% Pick up external pid and port.
 1440:     {ok, Peer, ExternalNode} = ?CT_PEER(),
 1441:     ExternalPid = rpc:call(ExternalNode, erlang, whereis, [code_server]),
 1442:     ExternalPort = hd(rpc:call(ExternalNode, erlang, ports, [])),
 1443:     Tracer = spawn(fun() -> receive never -> false end end),
 1444:     TraceSession = trace:session_create(?MODULE, Tracer, []),
 1445: 
 1446:     L = [
 1447:          {process, [TraceSession, a, true, []]},
 1448:          {process, [TraceSession, ExternalPid, true, []]},
 1449:          {process, [TraceSession, self(), not_boolean, []]},
 1450:          {process, [TraceSession, self(), true, bad_flags]},
 1451:          {process, [TraceSession, self(), true, [bad_flag]]},
 1452:          {process, [TraceSession, self(), true, [call|send]]},
 1453: 
 1454:          {port, [TraceSession, a, true, []]},
 1455:          {port, [TraceSession, ExternalPort, true, []]},
 1456:          {port, [TraceSession, self(), not_boolean, []]},
 1457:          {port, [TraceSession, self(), true, bad_flags]},
 1458:          {port, [TraceSession, self(), true, [bad_flag]]},
 1459:          {port, [TraceSession, self(), true, [send|'receive']]},
 1460: 
 1461: 
 1462:          {function, [TraceSession, a, true, []]},
 1463:          {function, [TraceSession, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, not_boolean, []]},
 1464:          {function, [TraceSession, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, true, bad_flags]},
 1465:          {function, [TraceSession, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, true, [bad_flag]]},
 1466:          {function, [TraceSession, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, true, [local|meta]]},
 1467:          {function, [TraceSession, {?MODULE,'_','_'}, [{[self(), '_'],[],[]}], [call_count]]},
 1468: 
 1469:          {send, [TraceSession, a, []]},
 1470:          {send, [TraceSession, true, bad_flags]},
 1471:          {send, [TraceSession, true, [bad_flag]]},
 1472: 
 1473:          {recv, [TraceSession, a, []]},
 1474:          {recv, [TraceSession, true, bad_flags]},
 1475:          {recv, [TraceSession, true, [bad_flag]]},
 1476: 
 1477:          {info, [bad_session, self(), flags]},
 1478:          {info, [make_ref(), self(), flags]},
 1479:          {info, [atomics:new(1,[]), self(), flags]},
 1480:          {info, [TraceSession, ExternalPid, flags]},
 1481:          {info, [TraceSession, self(), bad_item]},
 1482: 
 1483:          {session_create, ["bad name", self(), []]},
 1484:          {session_create, [name, bad_tracer, []]},
 1485:          {session_create, [name, self(), bad_option]},
 1486:          {session_create, [name, self(), [bad_option]]},
 1487: 
 1488:          {session_destroy, [bad_session]},
 1489:          {session_destroy, [make_ref()]},
 1490:          {session_destroy, [atomics:new(1,[])]},
 1491: 
 1492:          {session_info, [ExternalPid]},
 1493: 
 1494:          {delivered, 2} %% Cannot fail
 1495:         ],
 1496: 
 1497:     try
 1498:         error_info_lib:test_error_info(trace, L, [allow_nyi])
 1499:     after
 1500:         peer:stop(Peer)
 1501:     end.
 1502: 
 1503: 
 1504: wait_bp_finish() ->
 1505:     wait_thread_progress(5).
 1506: 
 1507: wait_thread_progress(0) -> ok;
 1508: wait_thread_progress(N) ->
 1509:     ok = erts_debug:set_internal_state(wait, thread_progress),
 1510:     wait_thread_progress(N-1).
 1511: 
 1512: foo() ->
 1513:     ok.
 1514: 
 1515: exported(X) ->
 1516:     local(X).
 1517: 
 1518: local(_) ->
 1519:     ok.
 1520: 
 1521: tracer(Name, Tester) ->
 1522:     tracer(Name, Tester, true).
 1523: 
 1524: tracer(Name, Tester, Display) ->
 1525:     case Display of
 1526:         true -> put(display,true);
 1527:         _ -> ok
 1528:     end,
 1529:     tracer_loop(Name, Tester).
 1530: 
 1531: 
 1532: tracer_loop(Name, Tester) ->
 1533:     receive M ->
 1534:             io_format("~p ~p got message: ~p\n", [Name, self(), M]),
 1535:             Tester ! {self(), M}
 1536:     end,
 1537:     tracer_loop(Name, Tester).
 1538: 
 1539: 
 1540: receive_any() ->
 1541:     receive_any(1000).
 1542: 
 1543: receive_any(Timeout) ->
 1544:     receive M -> M
 1545:     after Timeout -> timeout
 1546:     end.
 1547: 
 1548: receive_nothing() ->
 1549:     receive_any(10).
 1550: 
 1551: %% Argument is a tuple of lists with expected messages to receive.
 1552: %% Each list is internally ordered according to expected reception.
 1553: %% The different lists in the tuple are mutually unordered.
 1554: %% '_' can be used as wildcard in message terms.
 1555: receive_parallel({}) ->
 1556:     ok;
 1557: receive_parallel(Tuple) ->
 1558:     M = receive_any(),
 1559:     receive_parallel(M, Tuple, tuple_size(Tuple)).
 1560: 
 1561: receive_parallel(M, Tuple, I) when I > 0 ->
 1562:     [Pattern|Tail] = element(I, Tuple),
 1563:     case {match(Pattern, M), Tail} of
 1564:         {true, []} ->
 1565:             receive_parallel(erlang:delete_element(I, Tuple));
 1566:         {true, _} ->
 1567:             receive_parallel(setelement(I, Tuple, Tail));
 1568:         {false, _} ->
 1569:             receive_parallel(M, Tuple, I-1)
 1570:     end;
 1571: receive_parallel(M, Tuple, 0) ->
 1572:     Failed = [H || [H|_] <- tuple_to_list(Tuple)],
 1573:     io:format("Expected any of:\n~p\n", [Failed]),
 1574:     io:format("Got message:\n~p\n", [M]),
 1575:     ct:fail("Unexpected messages: ~p", [M]).
 1576: 
 1577: %% Same as receive_parallel/1 but accepts a *list* of message lists
 1578: %% and the message lists are allowed to be empty meaning no expected messages.
 1579: receive_parallel_list(List0) ->
 1580:     List1 = lists:filter(fun(E) -> E =/= [] end, List0),
 1581:     receive_parallel(list_to_tuple(List1)).
 1582: 
 1583: receive_unsorted(Expect) ->
 1584:     receive_unsorted(Expect, length(Expect)).
 1585: 
 1586: receive_unsorted(Expect0, Cnt) when Cnt > 0 ->
 1587:     M = receive_any(),
 1588:     Expect1 = match_and_delete(M, Expect0, []),
 1589:     receive_unsorted(Expect1, Cnt-1);
 1590: receive_unsorted(_, 0) ->
 1591:     ok.
 1592: 
 1593: match_and_delete(M, [Pattern | Tail], Failed) ->
 1594:     case match(Pattern, M) of
 1595:         true -> Failed ++ Tail;
 1596:         false ->
 1597:             match_and_delete(M, Tail, [Pattern | Failed])
 1598:     end;
 1599: match_and_delete(M, [], Failed) ->
 1600:     io:format("Expected any of:\n~p\n", [Failed]),
 1601:     io:format("Got message:\n~p\n", [M]),
 1602:     ct:fail("Unexpected messages: ~p", [M]).
 1603: 
 1604: 
 1605: 
 1606: match(A, A) -> true;
 1607: match('_', _) -> true;
 1608: match([Ah|At], [Bh|Bt]) ->
 1609:     match(Ah, Bh) andalso match(At, Bt);
 1610: match(A, B) when tuple_size(A) =:= tuple_size(B) ->
 1611:     match(tuple_to_list(A), tuple_to_list(B));
 1612: match(_A, _B) ->
 1613:     false.
 1614: 
 1615: 
 1616: end_of_list(_Config) ->
 1617:     ok.
